subject: Harness Racing
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
Horse Racing
Budgets and Budgeting
Gambling
lead_paragraph: Saturday will be the 30th consecutive year the Hambletonian has been held at the Meadowlands Racetrack, but a recent report recommended that New Jersey quit operating the track.
snippet: Saturday will be the 30th consecutive year the Hambletonian has been held at the Meadowlands Racetrack, but a recent report recommended that New Jersey quit operating the track.
